description.p: Passionate and bold, red dragonborn embody camaraderie and fearlessness. Resembling the legendary progenitor Kaldris, they have fiery-red scales and muscular builds. They enjoy festivities and social gatherings, and have a high alcohol tolerance. Valuing bravery and decisiveness, they can be impulsive and competitive. Their unwavering courage represents hope for Tanaresâ€™ people in the fight against the Ungods

Kaldris's Strength.
Your Strength score increases by 2 and Constitution score by 1 instead of the normal Dragonborn ability score increases.
